alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 20 at 10:17AM EDT until September 24 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. For the Peace...including Bartow, Zolfo Springs at SR 17, Arcadia at SR 70...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Peace River at Arcadia at SR 70. * WHEN...From Friday morning to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The Girl Scout camp floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday morning to a crest of 11.6 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.6 feet on 07/18/1943. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Peace River Arcadia at SR 7 11.0 8.4 Wed 9 am 9.9 10.9 11.6 11.3 10.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued BY 10PM tonightlate tonight by 130 AM EDT.
